title: PWV Year in Review 2025
description: Highlights and touchpoints with founders, partners, and the PWV community across early 2025.
intro:
2025 was a year of deliberate momentum.

From founder conversations and private salons to portfolio milestones and community announcements, PWV spent the year doing what we believe matters most early on: staying close to builders, tracking early signals, and creating space for community and connection.

This timeline reflects how we spent our time, where we focused our attention, and the ecosystem we built along the way.
